name: Slimo
description:
It's just a basic platform game I made on ClickTeam Fusion 2.5, it's a little challenging game for you to try out.

There is only 3 type of enemies at the moment available on the game:

An thorny eye creature

An thorny flying creature that looks like a fly

And a totem that guards the golden key on each level

All musics in this game belong to their respective owners and will be just place holder until I find someone willing to make the game's soundtrack.
